name: Dead Knight - Pocket Edition
description:
You are dead. Get yourself some body parts and you'll be fine

//Controls - (keyboard / gamepad)

move - left/right arrow / left stick

jump - up arrow / A button

attack - space / X button

action - down arrow / Y button

*Fullscreen - Alt+Enter
